FuncDef: This command configures the cross-reference required to link the CFM function with the service context. The link is created when thebridge-id, orbridge-namematches theservice-id, orservice-name, respectively.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the ID for a link to a specific service. Note that there is no verification that a service has been created with a matching service ID. Values-1 to 2147483647.
Specifies a link to a service by service-name, up to 64 characters.
